TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract IFieldControl

Docs.summary: Represents a contract that exposes properties that automatically generate fields that are based on data in a data-bound control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks This interface provides methods for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> data-bound controls. These data-bound controls automatically generate fields based on data.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Web::UI::IAutoFieldGenerator ^ FieldsGenerator { System::Web::UI::IAutoFieldGenerator ^ get(); void set(System::Web::UI::IAutoFieldGenerator ^ value); };
member this.FieldsGenerator : System.Web.UI.IAutoFieldGenerator with get, set

Docs.summary: Gets or sets the interface, which is the interface that generates fields in a data-bound control.
Docs.value: The interface that generates fields in data-bound controls.
